regen.absent_element: situation where a closure device's status changes to open without an operator's command
regen.new_specification: If the status of a closure device, which was previously closed at the current entrance, changes to open without an operator-initiated command, the sequence shall be halted.

regen.absent_element: halt sequence if status changes to open without operator's command after being previously closed
regen.new_specification: The sequence shall be halted if the status of a closure device, previously closed at the current entrance, changes to open without an operator-initiated command.

regen.absent_element: situation of a closure device changing to open without command
regen.new_specification: If the status of a closure device, which was previously closed at the current entrance, changes to open without an operator-initiated command, the sequence shall be halted.

label: The status of a closure device, which was previously closed at the current entrance, changes to unknown or open, without an operator-initiated command.
